bibl.title: Telegram from Frederick L. Rath, Jr., to Philip Showalter Hench, February 15, 1952

div1.p: Rath informs Hench that a meeting with General Grant is possible on Monday, February 25.

div1.head: Telegram from Frederick L. Rath, Jr., to Philip Showalter Hench, February 15, 1952
div1.opener:
WESTERN
UNION
W. P. MARSHALL, PRESIDENT
CLASS OF SERVICE
----
This is a full-rate
Telegram or Cable-
gram unless its de-
ferred character is in-
dicated by a suitable
symbol above or pre-
ceding the address.
1201
(14)..
__________________________________________________
The filing time shown in the date line on telegrams and day letters is STANDARD TIME at point of origin. Time of receipt is STANDARD TIME at point of destination
MA051
M.WA085 PD=WASHINGTON DC 15 1107A=
1952 FEB 15 AM 10 27
DR P S HENCH= MAYO CLINIC ROCHESTER MINN=
div1.p:
CONFERENCE WITH GENERAL GRANT POSSIBLE MONDAY FEBRUARY
25TH SUGGEST YOU CALL NATIONAL 2215 THAT MORNING=
div1.closer: FREDERICK L RATH DIRECTOR NATIONAL COUNCIL= THE COMPANY WILL APPRECIATE SUGGESTIONS FROM ITS PATRONS CONCERNING ITS SERVICE
